snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown of California reversed a parole board on Friday and denied the release of Bruce Davis, a former Charles Manson follower who has served more than 43 years in prison.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown reverses parole board decision, blocking release of Bruce Davis, former Charles Manson follower who has served more than 43 years in prison for 1969 slayings of Gary Hinman and Donald Shea.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown of California reversed a parole board on Friday and denied the release of Bruce Davis, a former Charles Manson follower who has served more than 43 years in prison.

headline.main: Governor Denies Parole to a Follower of Manson
headline.print_headline: Governor Denies Parole to a Manson Follower
